mapper.sql: id, uuid, code, name, address, pic, image, levels, price, create_user, DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS create_time, update_user, DATE_FORMAT( update_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_report
uuid, code, name,
address,
pic,
image,
levels,
price,
create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{levels,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE( #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE( #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
mapper.update:
update t_report
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic = #{pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
levels = #{levels,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = STR_TO_DATE( #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),
where code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
